name: The Utility Company
overview:
The Utility Company Ltd., a managed service provider, offers virtual IT service and support for small and medium-sized businesses by delivering the required hardware, software, and service for a monthly fixed fee per user. Its Connected Office service program provides a single point of contact to deliver and manage technology, communications, and vertical line of business applications remotely in North America. The companyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Connected Office services include Connected Office Network, a network management package that includes 24x7 remote monitoring and management of critical network infrastructure; Connected Office Managed, an end-to-end proactive technology support of network, desktops, security, and data back-up, including its 1-866-My-Utility end-user helpdesk; and Connected Office Virtual, a virtual server that provides virtual desktop and virtual exchange services. It serves distributor, entertainment, housing authority, manufacturing, non-profit association and council, property management and development, service provider, and transport industries.

The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Ottawa, Canada.

funding_rounds.source_description: The Utility Company Attracts $1 Million In Funding
